title: Second Cataclysm
description: The words of the fourth prophecy echoed in Cael’s mind as he stood on the edge of the sinkhole, looking down into the smoky abyss. Not only had he witnessed his own parents murdered by an assassin from a supposedly long-dead demonic cult, but his beloved home town had been ripped apart by the massive earthquake. The ancient revelation was being fulfilled with terrifying precision. Now, in a desperate race against the secretive cult, Cael must lead his friends in the relentless struggle. In order to save himself, his friends and even his world, Cael must discover that the true battle is not simply against the cult that assassinated his parents, but something much bigger…The Cult of Yex saga is a multi-part epic fantasy • Part Second Cataclysm • Part Prophecies of Old • Part Bystle Vale • Coming soon…
author: Jason F. Smith
